CS: GO, ist ein guter, taktischer Shooter. Nach rund 1000 Spielstunden muss ich sagen, dass Kommunikation und Spielverständnis, äußerst wichtig sind. Der Spaß am Spiel, vergeht leider nur, wenn manche Spieler, unerlaubte Hilfsmittel benutzen oder ihren hundertsten Account, auf Global Elite hoch spielen wollen.

Ich werde, dennoch ein Teil der Community bleiben, weil 80% der Spiele positiv verlaufen.

HF & G
The game is very good, but the ppls who play this game are very annoying. There are many russian and romanian cheaters.

10/10

Игра хороша, все отлично, баги бывают, пытаются разработчики сразу исправлять, но коммьюнити, оставляет желать лучшего, я не говорю за всех есть исключения.Так же здесь плохой ну очень плохой античит.
i wouldnt want everyone to play this game becasue u get scammed, i bought a prime nad wanted to charge back and didnt recieve my 15euros back what i needed
Toxic matchmaking, cooldowns are a joke.

in my opinion I think it is not a fun game. I say this due to the fact that bitches can one tap in the head with an ak-47, Deagle, awp etc. While some other gun do not do that. Aiming is weird as shit and makes absolutely no sense with the aiming mechanics displayed for you. Oh and the spray pattern as also a load of shit! Bullet will go straight to the moon and completely miss your target and you can be in there body, and lets not forget the no reg shots which is completely annoying. If you want to save your sanity and possibly your friendships and possibly relationships then please for the of all that is mighty stay away from this abomination and GO TOUCH SOME GRASS! thank you for the your time...
